data.comment: Antonio Nobre starts the match. Nacional with the kick-off in Funchal.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 2, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Antonio Nobre signals a Boavista throw-in in Nacional's half.
In the minute 44, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Boavista push forward at Estadio da Madeira and Angel Gomes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nacional defence.
At Estadio da Madeira the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Kalindi returns to the field for Nacional after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio da Madeira.
Attention is being given to Nacionalâ€™s Kalindi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, Ricardo Mangas grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Estadio da Madeira.
Angel Gomes with an assist there.
In the minute 46, Antonio Nobre blows to start the second-half. Boavista with the kick-off.
Luis Freire (Nacional) has taken off Kalindi who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ruben Freitas is the replacement.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Boavista have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio da Madeira.
Free kick in a good position for Nacional!
In the minute 52, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Important block from the Boavista defence as Witi fires in a strike for Nacional.
Ruben Micael for Nacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Antonio Nobre awards Boavista a goal kick.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Nobre awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Ruben Freitas for Nacional has been booked by Antonio Nobre and receives a first yellow card.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Nacional.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 59, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Sauer is on target to give Boavista a 2-3 advantage.
In the minute 61, Great play from Angel Gomes to set up the goal.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Boavista.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Funchal.
In Funchal, Witi of Nacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 65, Antonio Nobre signals a throw-in for Nacional, close to Boavista's area.
Angel Gomes (Boavista) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Boavista.
Vincent Thill is on a sub for Joao Victor for Nacional.
Boavista to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
In the minute 69, Boavista's Nuno Valente Santos breaks free at Estadio da Madeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Boavista defender.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Boavista.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Vincent Koziello with Larry Azouni.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nacional close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, Nacional are coming forward and Vincent Thill gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Angel Gomes.
In the minute 77, Nacional are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Boavista's Angel Gomes looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 78, Nacional's Ruben Micael gets in a shot on goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Larry Azouni for Nacional drives towards goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Luis Freire is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio da Madeira with Bryan Rochez replacing Ruben Micael.
Vasco Seabra (Boavista) is making a first substitution, with Miguel Reisinho replacing Angel Gomes.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 82, At Estadio da Madeira, Vincent Thill has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Javi Garcia is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Javi Garcia has recovered and rejoins the match in Funchal.
In the minute 84, Important block from the Nacional defence as Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez fires in a strike for Boavista.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
The away team have replaced Gustavo Sauer with Show. This is the second substitution made today by Vasco Seabra.
Nacional's Brayan Riascos misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 86, Antonio Nobre awards Boavista a goal kick.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nacional's Bryan Rochez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Boavista defender.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Nacional.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Antonio Nobre.
Witi (Nacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Boavista.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Nacional.
Antonio Nobre signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Joao Camacho (Nacional) nets with a header to make it 3-3 at Estadio da Madeira.
Ruben Freitas instrumental with a fine assist.
Bryan Rochez is booked for the home team.
